author: Coffeezilla
description:
Several months ago I got offered a "bounty" and "$20k" to expose a casino in the Counter Strike Industry. I was both insulted and intrigued. After investigating, I realized there WAS a story here, but not the one that I was offered.
WATCH EPISODE 2 NOW!
► https://www.patreon.com/posts/ep-2-exposing-118246271?utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=postshare_creator&utm_content=join_link

title: I Got Bribed By Casinos, So I Exposed Them Instead
